resources.string: This app cannon work without a camera permission
It looks like your device does not support camera. This app cannot work without a camera.
Why do we need camera permission?
We need camera permission so you can take a photo that will be sent to someone else. This app cannot work without the camera permission
Would you like to delete this photo as well?
Please enter old user uuid to restore an account. This action will remove all your current photos
It appears that your phone has no Google Play Services installed. That\'s okay but you won\'t be able to receive push notifications.
Why do we need gps permission?

We need gps permission so other people can see where the photo was taken from. This is not a required permission so you can disable it. Other people won\'t be able to see where your photos were taken.
End of the list reached.\nClick here to reload
Unknown error has occurred while trying to load photos. \nClick here to retry
Current UserUuid is empty (no photos uploaded yet)
Network Access Level on metered network
Unknown error while trying to restore account: %1$s
Tap here to copy User UUID to clipboard

User UUID is basically your account ID. Every photo you upload is marked with this user ID so if you want to be able to access your photos from different phones or restore account after app has been uninstalled then you better save this UUID.

If photo visibility set to \"Always Public\" - all your photos will be available in the gallery for everyone, If it\'s set to \"Always Private\" then they won\'t. If it\'s set to \"Ask me every time\" - you will be asked what visibility to use every time you take a photo.

It\'s better to set this setting to \"Can Load Images\" when you are connected to unmetered network (unlimited download rate). By setting it to \"Can Access Internet\" - you won\'t be loading any images when you are not connected to an unmetered network, any other lightweight requests will still be possible. Finally setting it to \"Neither\" completely disables any network interactions when you are not connected to an unmetered network.
A new photo has been received
Cannot upload photo because current network is metered and it is not allowed to upload/download photos with metered network in settings (You can override it in settings)
Cannot check for received photos because current network is metered and it is not allowed to access internet with metered network in settings (You can override it in settings)

If made public then this photo will be added to the gallery so all people will be able to see it (The location where the photo was taken will be visible for everyone as well). Otherwise only you and the person who receives this photo will be able to see it.
